item.title: Split a GitHub repository into a main repos and a submodule
item.description: Context We have a local folder MAIN associated with a GitHub repository, also called MAIN. The structure is as follows: MAIN ├── 1_dir_A │ ├── content_AA │ │ ├── file_AAA.ext │ │ └── file_AAB.ext │ └── content_AB │ ├── file_ABA.ext │ ├── file_ABB.ext │ └── file_ABC.ext ├── 2_dir_B │ ├── content_BA │ │ ├── file_BAA.ext │ │ └── file_BAB.ext │ └── content_BB │ ├── file_BBA.ext │ └── file_BBB.ext ├── README.md ├── .git └── .gitignore Goal We want to:
